titles.title: A bill to advocate for the release of United States citizens and locally employed diplomatic staff unlawfully detained in Turkey, and for other purposes.
Defending United States Citizens and Diplomatic Staff from Political Prosecutions Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
